page.title: 18HIGHBRIDGE DOCKS NOWADAYS
page.content: HIGHBRIDGE DOCKS nowadays have almost disappeared.They are being rapidly filled in with rubble from the drainage work being carried on in the town at the moment.There is quite a lot to see if you look carefully,old sleepers,the derelict cattle dock,the Willet warehouse,and the still used Bonded warehouses.The sawmills are still used & look just the same as old photos of them.At the far end of the dock,where it has been filled in,you can still see the old lock gates,where the river crossed the main A.38 road.Some steps,and the base of the old crane still shows under the brambles too.The boatyard still is in use,repairing and building small craft.One of the original cranes is still in use in the boatyard.
